bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: - Use mr-IN typing-booster - type something - Open setup tool and enable "Add direct input" - type something - Open setup tool and disable "Add direct input" - type something - Open setup tool and enable "Add direct input" - type something -> Crash
Version-Release number of selected component: ibus-typing-booster-1.5.2-1.fc25
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.7.2 cmdline: /usr/bin/python3 /usr/share/ibus-typing-booster/engine/main.py --ibus executable: /usr/share/ibus-typing-booster/engine/main.py kernel: 4.8.0-0.rc4.git0.1.fc25.x86_64 pkg_vendor: (none) runlevel: N 5 type: Python3 uid: 1000
Truncated backtrace: hunspell_table.py:248:update_transliterated_strings:KeyError: 'NoIme'
Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/share/ibus-typing-booster/engine/hunspell_table.py", line 1329, in do_process_key_event result = self._process_key_event (key) File "/usr/share/ibus-typing-booster/engine/hunspell_table.py", line 1724, in _process_key_event self._editor.insert_string_at_cursor([key.msymbol]) File "/usr/share/ibus-typing-booster/engine/hunspell_table.py", line 293, in insert_string_at_cursor self.update_transliterated_strings() File "/usr/share/ibus-typing-booster/engine/hunspell_table.py", line 248, in update_transliterated_strings self._transliterators[ime].transliterate( KeyError: 'NoIme'
Local variables in innermost frame: self: <hunspell_table.editor object at 0x7f106fb5e898> ime: 'NoIme'
Created attachment 1197104 File: backtrace
Created attachment 1197105 File: environ
